title.value: Поларис, МЭ и Бенефис, МЭ - новые протравители для обработки семян зерновых культур
Polaris, ME and Benefis, ME – new seed dressers for grain crop seed treatment

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Leshkevich, V.G., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute of Plant Protection

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus currently into the

there were introduced two new preparations with the original combination of active substances - Polaris, microemulsion (ME) and Benefit, microemulsion (ME) for the protection of winter crops and spring crops against disease by seed dressing. Polaris, ME contains three active ingredients, two of which render systemic effects (imazalil and tebuko-nazol),  and one of a single action( prochloraz). The study of the funcicide action against seed infection (Fusarium, Helminthosporium) shows the effectiveness of 100%. In field trials in 2012 against moderate development of snow mold, which killed winter wheat and winter triticale at the level of 6.4 and 5.5%, respectively, the biological efficiency of the preparation was at the level and standard and depending on the application rate was 67,2-100%. In protection of spring crops against diseases besides fungicide Polaris, ME there was examined the efficiency of a preparation Benefit, ME at rates of 0.6 and 0.8 liter / ton. The preparation contains three active ingredients having systemic properties - imazalil, metalaxyl and tebuconazole.
